title: Using pollen DNA metabarcoding to trace the geographical and botanical origin of honey from Karangasem, Indonesia
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Saeed ullah, Fahrul Huyop, Roswanira Abdul Wahab, I Gede Arya Sujana, Nyoman Semadi Antara, Ida Bagus Wayan Gunam
